group_1.textLeft: It's no good to keep your distance!
You'll have to learn to deal with close combat@like I told you to!

group_1.textRight: Until just now, we were practicing avoiding@long-range attacks.
It's hard to adjust when I'm suddenly challenged@to close-range...

group_1.textLeft: What if the enemy gets right on top of you in a@real fight?
By that point, it's too late for you to mull it over.
The last thing you need is to get lost in thought.
You have to prepare for enough situations that@your body will act on instinct.
In track races, there are times when another@athlete gets a false start,
And everyone has to start over...
A tailwind can suddenly turn into a headwind.
It's important to practice for every possible@situation.
That way, you can keep your focus even when@the playing field suddenly changes,
And get a good time on the day of the competition!

group_1.textRight: Basically, you're saying...a battle against a Witch@is the same?

group_1.textLeft: You want to show Yuna the best Hikaru you can@be, right?
Then, should we give it one more go?

group_1.textRight: Yes! Please give me another chance!

group_1.textLeft: Then let's try again with all our might!
